channel.title: Project-Toxin | 718/742 | 24/7 uptime | farming with growing!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/logo-4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][URL=http://"http://project-toxin.com"]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][URL=http://"http://project-toxin.com/index.php?pageid=play"]Play Now[/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kjWch.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://project-toxin.com/vote"]Vote[/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qJohp.png[/img][URL=http://"http://project-toxin.com/index.php?pageid=donate"]Donate[/URL][/CENTER]
[B]An Introduction[/B]
Project-Toxin is currently a slowly growing community, focusing on all aspects of an enjoyable RSPS, we strive to bring only the best content to our players to create an enjoyable and balanced game, we have a vBulletin forum and the Game-Server is hosted on a VPS online 99.9% of the time with a very fast upload and download speed to bring you the game that you wan't to play at lightning fast speeds. Staff is on extremely frequently to monitor the server and interacting with players, our support team does it's very best to help every player in need and provide an enjoyable experience for every player. Our server includes skilling at it's finest with all 25 skills trainable even dungeoneering to 120 to get that sought after chaotic to sell or train with, we bring farming at a whole new level from raking weeds to harvesting watermelon. We feature a complex PvM system including all godwars bosses and even some special bosses that are donator-exclusive. Duel your friends at the duel arena or even stake competitors for high rewards and facing terrible losses, pit against enemies in a huge free for all at the fight pits, or even steal the other teams flag in a a game of castle wars. Player kill safely in clan wars, or try your luck in the crucible, fight other players in the deep wilderness at mage-bank or just casually pk in edgeville.
[B]Miscellaneous Features[/B]
Advanced teleportation tab WIP Achievement Tab Fight Caves and Kiln Dominion Tower Barrows Duel Arena Castle Wars Fight Pits Godwars Bosses (Incl. Nex) Corporeal Beast King and Queen Black Dragon Kalphite Queen Tormented Demons Hati Wolf Avatar of Destruction Nomad Glacors Polypore Dungeon Slayer Tower Kuradel's Slayer Dungeon Mutated Jadinko Lair Forinthry Dungeon
[B]Skilling Features[/B]
All 25 Skills trainable Farming with growing Dungeoneering to 120 Hunter - Puro Puro and Bird/Chinchompa Trapping Summoning - Pouch creation Construction - Create Furniture Slayer - Tasks skipping and rewards Mining - Lava flow mining and LRC Smithing - Armour/Weapon forging and Artisan's Workshop Agility - Gnome and Barbarian Courses (Incl. Advanced) Herblore - Extreme/Overload making Thieving - Stall thieving Crafting - Gem cutting Fletching - Making bows Runecrafting - Crafting runes Prayer - Bones on altar Magic - All spellbooks Ranged - Ava's and Chaotic Crossbow Dungeoneering - Unique dungeon kill for exp and tokens
[IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_22h17_27.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h52_40.png[/img][IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h52_56.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h53_39.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h54_41.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h57_11.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h57_32.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h58_10.png[/img][IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h57_56.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h58_51.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h59_05.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h59_31.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_21h59_57.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_22h09_50.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1218.photobucket.com/albums/dd403/Glitchy/2013-04-24_22h08_27.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/u0D1uo6.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UNkYAl9.png[/img]

item.title: Project-Toxin | 718/742 | 24/7 uptime | farming with growing!
item.dc:creator: @project-toxin project-toxin
item.description:
@project-toxin wrote:

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:5, topic:517955”][quote author=project-toxin link=topic=636219.msg4289520#msg4289520 date=1366985092]

typical mentios leech…
Everyone has this shit.
And it is shit.

I’m pretty sure not many other servers have farming like us, and i know they don’t have an achievement system. so you can just stop.
[/quote]
IT MENTIOS ITS NOT YOUR FARMING ACHIEVEMENT SYSTEM NOTHING IS YOURS SO YOU CAN STOP LMAO![/quote]

Mentios doesn’t come with farming at all, nor an achievement system. Go download the source and see.

Edit: Upgraded to v bulletin 4.2

Read full topic

Forums
Play Now

Donate[/CENTER]

An Introduction

Project-Toxin is currently a slowly growing community, focusing on all aspects of an enjoyable RSPS, we strive to bring only the best content to our players to create an enjoyable and balanced game, we have a vBulletin forum and the Game-Server is hosted on a VPS online 99.9% of the time with a very fast upload and download speed to bring you the game that you wan’t to play at lightning fast speeds. Staff is on extremely frequently to monitor the server and interacting with players, our support team does it’s very best to help every player in need and provide an enjoyable experience for every player. Our server includes skilling at it’s finest with all 25 skills trainable even dungeoneering to 120 to get that sought after chaotic to sell or train with, we bring farming at a whole new level from raking weeds to harvesting watermelon. We feature a complex PvM system including all godwars bosses and even some special bosses that are donator-exclusive. Duel your friends at the duel arena or even stake competitors for high rewards and facing terrible losses, pit against enemies in a huge free for all at the fight pits, or even steal the other teams flag in a a game of castle wars. Player kill safely in clan wars, or try your luck in the crucible, fight other players in the deep wilderness at mage-bank or just casually pk in edgeville.

Miscellaneous Features

Advanced teleportation tab
WIP Achievement Tab
Fight Caves and Kiln
Dominion Tower
Barrows
Duel Arena
Castle Wars
Fight Pits
Godwars Bosses (Incl. Nex)
Corporeal Beast
King and Queen Black Dragon
Kalphite Queen
Tormented Demons
Hati Wolf
Avatar of Destruction
Nomad
Glacors
Polypore Dungeon
Slayer Tower
Kuradel’s Slayer Dungeon

Forinthry Dungeon

Skilling Features

All 25 Skills trainable
Farming with growing
Dungeoneering to 120
Hunter - Puro Puro and Bird/Chinchompa Trapping
Summoning - Pouch creation
Construction - Create Furniture
Slayer - Tasks skipping and rewards
Mining - Lava flow mining and LRC
Smithing - Armour/Weapon forging and Artisan’s Workshop
Agility - Gnome and Barbarian Courses (Incl. Advanced)
Herblore - Extreme/Overload making
Thieving - Stall thieving
Crafting - Gem cutting
Fletching - Making bows
Runecrafting - Crafting runes
Prayer - Bones on altar
Magic - All spellbooks
Ranged - Ava’s and Chaotic Crossbow
Dungeoneering - Unique dungeon kill for exp and tokens
